Blog.post: A day in my life usually consists of a lot of horrible stuff. Everyone always talks stuff to me all day long. it is incesent let down all day long......................Naw im just messin w/ u ppl. its not that bad. i have problems and all but it could be worse u know. like i could have like a wierd deformity where i have a rather large growth on my forehead or something. now that would suck would it not. well later dayz dudes.

we must not conform to the mold of everyday life around us. we must start a revolution and break free of the chains and colars of our captures.(Mmmm chains and colars.) we must no longer be slaves to the masters but must accend to a higher planes of existanse of humanity. we must truly begin to LIVE!

Alright. Apperrently some of u ppl are upset with recent happening between me and D'mari and i can kinda understand that. But plz do not just rush my e-mail like mi-mi did. D'mari I'll call u as soon as i can. Right now im working alot since im still grounded. Also amy, if ur mad at me just tell me and don't just sit there ploting against me. its not gonna get anything accoplished. now with that i must leave. i have to be at work in a little bit.

well the idiot down the street is being held hostage by her mother in north carolina so she can no longer bug/bother/get me in trouble so yayn............ I guess. well i get ungrounded in like 2 &1/2 weeks i think so i guess im alright but i miss d'mari real bad. i wish i could see her but i have no car and im still grounded. well maybe it aint as good as i thought it was. well thats all for now. later dayz.

well i was going to post something insiteful about my life thus far but there really isnt much to say. its all ready al out in the open. i now have no reason to really wright about anything. so these r my last words for awhile i guess. well later.(i love u dd)

u know usually my thoughts r on myself and ways to get laid but for once there has been something else on my mind.(actually i should say someone else). I'm sure u like 2 ppl who actualy read this thing know who im talking about. D'mari. well its all my fault that all this stuff is happening to her. it is also my fault that her and hunter broke up. and its all because i couldn't see passed what i wanted. but now all i want is for her to be happy even if it is without me so here u go ppl. my thought for the day.

well today kinda sucked as usual but what else is new. best part of it was getting to talk to dd today. i really dont think she believes that i love her as much as i do but i can understand that. i havent really been presented w/ a chance to prove that what i say is truely how i feel but somehow i will figure out a way. well ne*wayz aparrently i spelled D'mari's name wrong in my last post and i apologize for it. well time for me to go. later dayz!

u know what... i dont care if by somehow hunter finds out about me and u. i really love u and i dont care if he kicks my ass. it would be totally worth it. and i promise ill come see u as soon as i can. which shouldnt be to long. well i have to go for now. later dayz!

well this sux. the other night one of my friends showed up over at my house drunk out of her mind. since she is prego i thought i should help her out. so i jumped out my window and did the best i could. when i got home my mom had noticed i was gone and locked my window so i had to come in through the front door where she was waiting for me. at first she didnt believe me about it then i finnally managed to to believe it. well i almost got grounded more but she was being kinda kewl about all of it so hopefully i can manage to get myself ungrounded some how and then i can go see a certain someone (hehe). well ill see u guys later.

hey this is just me letting everyone know that im back online and that ill be makeing new posts very often so watch out for them. im sure a few ppl will be happy. well to the ppl that actually read this thing..u r much appreciated. later dayz

At the moment my life sux. i cant manage to get a job, i cant seem to get to see the girl that im in love w/ and now i just got grounded for like 2 months and to top it off i got hurt by an evil surf board. well ne*wayz im like really in love w/ one of my friends but at the moment she has a boyfriend who is a really big ass. well this really sux huh. well i hope u have had an enjoyable expeirence listening to me talk about how bad i have it. well later dayz.
